title: Blood moon kennen visual fix
body:
Hi!

i am soindo93 from EUNE server and i want to tell my idea about Blood moon kennen visual fix
In fact kennen basic attack can throw red stars, but W ability can gain electrical surge stacks and if these stacks are full the next basic attack add a Mark of the strom sign. That star is blue which add the Passive sign and i think the red star is better than blue in this skin.

Thanks

replies.body: Blood Moon Kennen? Hmmm... I never heard about that. Anyways these are the hungarian boards. I don't think u wanted to write here.
Új skin lesz majd a következő patchben. Vérhold Kennem meg Vérhold Yasuo.
You had better post this onto the English boards because they might delete this post soon.
You will only find Boilers and Pálinka here mate... Better post this in the english forums!
